Top-3 Similar Questions: so_13636663: Dividing per a lower number
so_30398014: Divide two variables in bash
Top-3 Scripts:
so_13636663: set -o nounset                              # Treat unset variables as an error
count=1
rtime=9

until [ $count -eq $rtime ]
do
    echo $(echo "scale=2; $((count*10))/$rtime" | bc)                                                                                 
    sleep 1
    count=$((count+1))
done

var1=3
